title: Phantom integrates with Kalshi to bring prediction markets to its web3 wallet
contentSnippet: The integration adds real-time odds, settlement notifications, and live community chat alongside Phantom's existing trading tools.

title: U.S. SEC Gives Implicit Nod for Tokenized Stocks
contentSnippet: Clearing and settlement company the Depository Trust & Clearing Corp. said a subsidiary had received a no-action letter to offer tokenized real-world assets.

title: New York Mandates AI Advertising Disclosures, Faces Showdown Over Trump Executive Order
contentSnippet: New York state legislation now mandates AI disclosure in advertising, while SAG-AFTRA lobbies for nationwide No Fakes Act protections.

title: Bitcoin's Volatility Meltdown: Crypto Daybook Americas

title: YouTube Now Allows U.S. Content Creators to Get Paid in PayPal’s Stablecoin: Fortune
contentSnippet: YouTube has added PayPal’s dollar-pegged stablecoin as a payout option for U.S. content creators, marking one of PYUSD’s most high-profile use cases yet.

title: DTCC subsidiary authorized to offer tokenization service for US securities beginning 2026
contentSnippet: DTCC's depository subsidiary has received an SEC No-Action Letter clearing it to offer a tokenization service for U.S. securities.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Stuck in Post-Fed Range as Altcoins Slump Deepens
contentSnippet: Bitcoin remains trapped in a range despite the U.S. rate cut, while altcoins and memecoins struggle to attract risk appetite amid shifting investor behavior.

title: Save the Children’s new Bitcoin Fund seeks to maximize donation value with up to four-year holding strategy
contentSnippet: The initiative builds on the charity's early adoption of bitcoin donations to improve speed, transparency, and cost efficiency.

title: Hollywood Director Guilty of Scamming Netflix out of $11M, Spending It on Crypto
contentSnippet: “47 Ronin” director Carl Rinsch faces a maximum prison sentence of up to 90 years, having been found guilty on seven separate charges.

title: From Lockstep to Lag, Bitcoin Poised to Catch Up With Small Cap Highs
contentSnippet: The Federal Reserve begins Treasury bill purchases later Friday, starting with $8.2 billion as part of its reserve management program.

title: Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest picks up $15.4 million in Robinhood shares and more of its own Bitcoin ETF
contentSnippet: The investment firm continues to rebalance its fund weightings amid market volatility, with Robinhood stock closing down 9% on Thursday.

contentSnippet: Several major crypto players, including Gemini and Crypto.com, are also venturing into the growing prediction market sector.

title: Standard Chartered, Coinbase Expand Crypto Prime Services for Institutions
contentSnippet: The companies will explore the development of trading, prime services, custody, staking and lending solutions for institutional clients.

title: YouTube now allows US creators to receive payouts in PayPal’s PYUSD stablecoin: report
contentSnippet: PayPal's PYUSD currently holds a market capitalization of $3.9 billion as the world's eighth largest stablecoin.

title: deBridge launches new execution model to simplify onchain experience
contentSnippet: DeBridge launched a new execution model that allows users to interact with blockchains without having to manage various requirements.

title: Boring Bitcoin's Green Light Moment Incoming?
contentSnippet: BTC continues to bore traders with its directionless price action. But some indicators are pointing to renewed bullishness.

contentSnippet: Traders appeared more focused on preserving trend structure than chasing upside, with flows concentrated in large-cap assets.

title: Dogecoin Hovers Near Key Support as Fed Easing Fails to Spark Risk Rally
contentSnippet: Despite elevated trading activity, Dogecoin faces resistance near $0.1425, and its future movement is likely dependent on broader market sentiment.

contentSnippet: The group calls for a forward-looking framework to maintain the U.K.'s fintech leadership and attract international investment.

title: YouTube Now Lets US Creators Take Earnings in PayPal's Stablecoin: Report

title: Elliptic Flags Global Crypto Pivot as Banks, Stablecoins and Asian Hubs Take the Lead

title: Bitcoin's Persistent Long-Term Buyers Step In as Market Struggles For Liquidity
contentSnippet: Experts remain cautiously optimistic as macro hurdles clear amid Bitcoin whale accumulation and liquidity drying up ahead of the holidays.

title: Trump’s New AI Order Sets Up Federal Fight With US States Over Industry Regulation
contentSnippet: The White House has directed the DOJ to challenge state AI laws and highlighted Colorado’s algorithmic discrimination statute.

title: Stablecoins Gain Ground in Blockchain Gaming as Studios Tighten Spending, Study Finds
contentSnippet: New industry data shows developers leaning on stablecoins and disciplined business models as blockchain studios adjust to cooling markets.

title: OpenAI Launches GPT-5.2 Amid Expanded Major Contracts
contentSnippet: OpenAI unveiled GPT-5.2, featuring upgrades for scientific, mathematical, and software tasks, as employers mull AI for technical work.

title: Hex Trust to issue and custody wrapped XRP to expand DeFi utility across multiple blockchains

title: Coinbase-incubated x402 payments protocol built for AIs rolls out V2
contentSnippet: x402 V2 is “multi-chain by default” and compatible with “legacy payment rails,” like ACH and card networks.

title: Google's New Browser Promises to End the Tyranny of the Tab
contentSnippet: Google's Disco builds custom apps from your open tabs, hinting at a post-search future.

title: US Senators make ‘real progress’ on sweeping crypto market bill following talks with bank execs
contentSnippet: Sen. Scott said "real progress" is being made to pass a massive cryptocurrency bill into law after meeting with top bank CEOs on Thursday.

title: NFT winter deepens: Monthly sales hit lowest point of the year
contentSnippet: NFT sales fell to $320 million in November — their lowest this year — with early December off to a weak start as top collections slide across the board.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
